FiniteObjectRuleTemplate - Class in cellularAutomata.rules.templates
A convenience class/template for all rules that have a finite number of states of any type (for example, Complex numbers, Doubles, Colors, Images, Files, or even a mix of different types).
FiniteObjectRuleTemplate(boolean) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.rules.templates.FiniteObjectRuleTemplate

FourNeighborSquareLattice - Class in cellularAutomata.lattice
A simple two-dimensional square lattice with wrap around boundary conditions and four nearest neighbors (von Neumann neighborhood).
FourNeighborSquareLattice() - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.lattice.FourNeighborSquareLattice
Default constructor required of all Lattices (for reflection).
FourNeighborSquareLattice(String, Rule, int) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.lattice.FourNeighborSquareLattice
Create a two-dimensional cellular automaton with the same rule at all positions.
Fractal - Class in cellularAutomata.rules
A rule which assigns complex numbers to each cell and then displays them as Mandelbrot and Julia sets.
Fractal(boolean) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.rules.Fractal
Create a rule that displays a Mandlebrot set and other fractals.
FractalIteration - Class in cellularAutomata.rules
A rule which assigns complex numbers to each cell and then displays them as Mandelbrot and Julia sets.
FractalIteration(boolean) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.rules.FractalIteration
Create a rule that displays a Mandlebrot set and other fractals.
FractalThreshold - Class in cellularAutomata.rules
A rule which assigns complex numbers to each cell; if the modulus of "the sum of the neighbors minus the cell" is less than a threshold, then the cell is multiplied by 1-i.
FractalThreshold(boolean) - Constructor for class cellularAutomata.rules.FractalThreshold
Create a rule that displays fractals based on a threshold.
